thread.title: Exactus Advisors Promotes Steve Zingsheim to Managing Partner

author: cnbc.com
title: Exactus Advisors Promotes Steve Zingsheim to Managing Partner
text:
CHICAGO, Feb. 27, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Exactus Advisors, a Chicago-based management and operational consulting firm, is pleased to announce Steve Zingsheim as a new managing partner. The promotion strengthens the firm's core practice areas of operational improvement, risk mitigation, and advanced analytics.
Zingsheim has been consulting since 2014, specializing in unlocking operational value with advanced analytics and focusing on improving pricing, logistics, inventory and organizational design. Zingsheim joined Exactus Advisors in January 2017 and has continued to bring his practical, operational business leadership experience.
"We are delighted at Steve's accomplishments in the past year and formally welcome him into the partnership," states Tom Lebamoff, Exactus Advisors Managing Partner, CEO and Bruce Rylance, Exactus Advisors Managing Partner, COO.
Prior to consulting, Zingsheim was General Manager and Senior Vice President at Bradley Corporation for over 20 years. There he honed practical, hands-on experience in plant operations, sales, marketing, and product lifecycle management. His recent client successes include doubling operating income for a commercial building products manufacturer by applying innovative analytics in profit and pricing optimization integrating into complex sales operations.
"Steve embodies the Exactus hallmarks of passion, creativity and business acumen and will further strengthen Exactus ability to effectively partner with our clients to tackle complex, challenging situations. Steve is leading a critical project that created a disrupting technology solution for the buying group industry. We are very proud of Steve and look forward to scaling our solution across this fragmented landscape," says Lebamoff and Rylance.
About Exactus Advisors
Exactus Advisors is a leading Chicago advisory and consulting firm specializing in driving operational improvement and transformation. Our specialized teams excel in quickly addressing complex business problems for our clients, providing the roadmap and support to deliver maximum value. Working alongside our clients we act as a force multiplier to your management team, helping illuminate the greatness of your employees and deliver value. We are direct, to the point and very passionate about the work, results and success of our clients. More information about Exactus Advisors can be found at www.exactusadvisors.com .
